subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Donnie Walsh, now the president of basketball operations for the Pacers, had envisioned a Knicks team as powerful as they are now, although overhauling the roster perhaps took longer than some might have anticipated.
snippet: Donnie Walsh, now the president of basketball operations for the Pacers, had envisioned a Knicks team as powerful as they are now, although overhauling the roster perhaps took longer than some might have anticipated.
